thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 10 of 620
thread.title: Annie T.

author: Annie T.
title: Annie T.
text: Overall, I like the website. There are many selections to choose from and comes in multiple colors. My issue is the different "brands" that Yesstyle orders from. Some of them don't sell quality things and different "brands" will sell the same or very similar products. The description and sizing could use some work as it's sometimes confusing or there is not much clarification when selling sets. You have to spend a lot of time going through the different reviews to make sure you end up picking quality items, as not all of them are bad.
